creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: four panels of various sizes sewn together; stripes of maroon, purples, oranges, dark blue, greens and white with maroon and gold geometric stripes at outer ends; central area of maroon and gold stripes with various diamond motif stitching alternating with maroon stripes (flanked by narrower stripes of various colors) with small geometric designs in various colors
title: Panel
